definition: movement once around a course, to make a circuit
details:
noun
- movement once around a course
= synonyms: lap
- a journey or route all the way around a particular place or area
= synonyms: tour
- an electrical device that provides a path for electrical current to flow
= synonyms: electrical circuit, electric circuit
- a racetrack for automobile races
= synonyms: racing circuit
- (law) a judicial division of a state or the United States (so-called because originally judges traveled and held court in different locations)
= example: (law) a judicial division of a state or the United States (so-called because originally judges traveled and held court in different locations)
- the boundary line encompassing an area or object
= synonyms: circumference
- an established itinerary of venues or events that a particular group of people travel to
= example: an established itinerary of venues or events that a particular group of people travel to
verb
- to make a circuit
= example: to make a circuit
